sense.name: the faculty of conscious volition
sense.examples: The philosopher discussed the doctrine of free will. Mary has a daily battle of wills with her two-year-old daughter. It seems unlikely that plants and viruses possess will.

sense.name: a specific state of intentional purpose
sense.examples: He was forced to sign the document at gun point against his will. They said the flood was God's will. The patient has a tremendous will to live.

sense.name: legal document providing instructions for the idspersal of one's personal estate at death
sense.examples: The man's grandfather cut him out of his will. The couple hired an attorney to draw up their will.
